taxYearReturn.description: The ending year of the tax year to which the return relates, in the format YYYY-YY.

totalLiabilityAmount.description: The total amount of the Self Assessment tax return inclusive of coded charges. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

taxYearCoding.description: The tax year to which the coded out charge will be attached, in the format YYYY-YY.

coded.description: An object containing a coded amount and initiation date

charge.description: The coded out charge. The value must be between -99999999999.99 and 99999999999.99 up to 2 decimal places.

initiationDate.description: Initiation date of the coded out charge, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
